gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 108, Mavericks 94
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Mavericks, 108-94.  Desmond Bane led the way with 30 points, four rebounds and five assists for the Grizzlies, while Grant Williams tallied 16 points and eight rebounds for the Mavericks in the losing effort.  The Grizzlies improve to 5-13 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 11-7.
